attributes.action: Stop Victims of Domestic Violence also suffering at the hands of police and other government agencies
attributes.additional_details:
The Government NEED to address the police procedure when dealing with sensitive ongoing issues that involve Domestic Abuse.
Women/Men That Flea Domestic Violence need more protection against false allegations. The Police current  procedure is  that "ALL allegations involving domestic Violence WILL follow an arrest" this is becoming a way of an Abuser to continue their abuse Emotionally and mental Trauma through false allegations and arrests without evidence needed Just a phone call .
